name: Plague - Horrorgame Demo Wip
description:
Plague - Horrorgame - Demo WORK IN PROGRESS  - Some features, including sounds, visuals and story, are absent or placeholders. This demo does not represent the final quality of the game. -Plague is an indie horror game were you play as a escape of the plague chased by a plague doctor. It is the year 1749 and you are trying to escape from berlin that got hit by the plague. You are on the way out of town with your coach but your horses get scared for some reason and they send you flying down a hill. Now you find yourself in front of a small town and you need to get out of there...fast.  Your goal is to survive and escape from the plague doctor that is chasing you down. -Please donate to help us develop this game so we can make the game as good as possible.10$ - get mentioned in the game 20$ - get mentioned in the game + we add something to the game you wish30$+ - get mentioned in the game as special donatator + private contact to us for all your ideas, which should be added to the game.

-Follow us on itch.io and youtube under https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcpgMUEhkzvh7ptNsWPyy2w for the latest news on plague.
